publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3293 Pauline McNeill: Windfall Payment to Glasgow City Council—That the Parliament welcomes the windfall payment of £12.5 million to Glasgow City Council from the Scottish Executive to be spent on children and the environment and applauds the council's decision to provide free drinking water in schools, cheap travel for pupils and free swimming lessons.
S1M-3293 Windfall Payment to Glasgow City Council (lodged on 26 July 2002) Robin Harper*, Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3293 Windfall Payment to Glasgow City Council (lodged on 26 July 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3293 Windfall Payment to Glasgow City Council (lodged on 26 July 2002) Elaine Smith*, Johann Lamont*
